items.name: Emily Carter

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about AI Lip Sync

items.title: What types of audio can be used for lip sync?
items.description: You can use various audio formats such as MP3, WAV, and OGG. Just upload your clip that contains the dialogue or sound you want your character to sync with.

items.title: Is there a limit on the character videos I can upload?
items.description: You can upload multiple character videos; however, please refer to our user guidelines for file size and format restrictions.

items.title: Can I use the animated content for commercial projects?
items.description: Yes, users with a subscription plan can utilize their animated content for commercial purposes. Ensure to check our Terms of Service for specifics.

items.title: How does WaveSpeed ensure my data is secure?
items.description: All uploads and processing happen locally on your device, ensuring that your data remains private and is not stored externally.

footer.heading: Ready to Animate Your Characters?
